blurbs.text:
Custom Solutions

Adapt the sotware to your needs, not the other way round.

Outsourced Product Development

Focus on your core, leave the rest to us.

Business Management Solutions

  • Custom CRM, ERP, field sales reporting solutions.
  • Marketing automation - do much more than just bulk email promotions.

Digital Transformation

Digitize your workplace with confidence and assurance.

Modernization

Bring your legacy applications back to life. Leverage your existing investments.

Multi-site, multi-tenant SaaS (Software-as-a-Service)

Connect all your locations/ franchisees. Always access the latest software, no messy upgrades and downtimes!

Web and mobile apps, PWAs (progressive web apps)

Access from anywhere, anytime. Get real-time updates and notifications.

Third-party integrations

Seamless integration with other software with open standards.

Automation

Improve productivity, reduce costs, standardise processes, retain knowledge.

Analytics and visualization

Gain valuable insights beyond the data.

Advanced technologies (AI, ML, NLP)

Take your business to the next level. Use chatbots to handle support. Create research-ready datasets to analyse areas of your interest â€“ product, market, customer.

With you, all the way!

  • We are keen to engage with you to learn and understand your needs to enable you to get things done in the best possible way.
  • You get our full, uninterrupted attention via a dedicated relationship manager as your single point of contact throughout.
  • We value fruitful, meaningful, long-term relationships.

Fair and transparent pricing

  • Our modern technology and processes ensure high quality software and sustained support at competitive pricing.
  • We give a detailed breakup of exactly what and how much you are paying for. No unpleasant surprises!

End-to-end solutions (E2ES)

  • We offer consulting, design and implementation of end-to-end software solutions, taking complete ownership of the project from start to end.
  • We endeavour to give you the best customer experience without us getting in the way.

testimonials.author: Dr. Yogesh Bendale, Rasayu
testimonials.quote: We are working in the field of oncology for more than two decades. We needed to efficiently manage and analyze huge amount of medical data in our clinics. So we decided to design a competent customized software. We met many experts, but our experience was exasperating. Then we consulted Praniya. In the very first meeting, we got enough confidence from their understanding and ability to give proper solutions. We found them to be: Patient listeners; Thorough and quick understanding of problems; Perfect and practical solutions; Value for time; Great teamwork.

testimonials.author: Piran Elavia, Kipepeo
testimonials.quote: As a small travel company with niche operations, we had unique business requirements for a software to manage our operations. Praniya patiently designed and built a software to suit our requirements. We were extremely happy with the professional manner in which not only the software was built, but also in the way we got ready support for the issues we faced. Would highly recommend them for their commitment and timely work.
